name: Sky High (lafferty)
description:
A very simple game built and released during the GMTK Game Jam of 2020 for the theme "Out of Control".


- Build balloons using "Whale Gas" to go higher

- Build platforms to build more balloons

- Click on whales to get them out of your way and gather "Whale Gas"

- Try not to take on too much weight

Go Sky High!
